Synopsis: Retrieves information about Group Policy Objects (GPO) stored in the Netlogon and SYSVOL directories.
Description: The Get-GPOZaurrNetLogon function retrieves details about GPOs stored in the Netlogon and SYSVOL directories of specified domains within a forest. It provides information about file ownership, status, domain, extension, creation time, and more.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-GPOZaurrNetLogon -Forest "contoso.com" -IncludeDomains "domain1", "domain2"
Retrieves GPO information for the specified forest and domains.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-GPOZaurrNetLogon -OwnerOnly
Retrieves GPO information only for GPOs with identified owners.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 3
Examples.Code:
Get-GPOZaurrNetLogon -SkipOwner
Retrieves GPO information while skipping the owner check.
